landing.title: Quickly source trained and credentialed talent.
landing.introduction: Find the right talent painlessly on our candidate sourcing platform, quality assured and exclusively for the skilled workforce.

benefits.title: Quickly Recruit Skilled Candidates
benefits.description: Save time and find that perfect candidate faster by only reviewing trained and verified job seekers for your skills-based openings, without having to dig through hundreds of unqualified resumes.

features.featureContent: We only allow students or graduates of our partner schools to create profiles on WorkAmerica to ensure that our job seekers are completing verified training programs and earning industry-recognized credentials.

Short on Bandwidth? Post your job opening to our thousands of skilled verified candidates, and have them apply to you. Need a candidate yesterday? Search through our rich pool of their graduate and alumni profiles to find the perfect matches, along with their direct contact information to start calling candidates immediately.
Simultaneously batch text and email active job seekers and passive prospects to start the conversation.

benefits.title: Source From Untapped Talent Pools
benefits.description: On WorkAmerica, you'll find candidates that aren’t on those other job boards, because we go straight to the source: schools.

features.featureContent: Connect to verified talent from community colleges, technical colleges, non-profit training centers, credentialing agencies, and more, without the pain of navigating school bureaucracies.
Identify and contact Alumni that have graduated and gained work experience in their field, making them perfect candidates for your middle and senior level positions

features.featureTitle: Track and Export Your Recruiting Funnel
features.featureContent: Track candidates as they move through your hiring process in our straight forward ATS, or CSV export them to the tools you already use.

benefits.title: Build Your Talent Pipeline
benefits.description: Build a strong talent pipeline for your company with high quality skilled talent to ensure your long-term competitive advantage.

features.featureTitle: Stay Ahead of the Recruiting Curve
features.featureContent: Connect with students before they hit the job market by knowing their graduation date and being the first to reach out
Hire students currently in school for apprenticeships, clinicals, internships, and more, to build up your workforce of the future.

features.featureTitle: Connect with Local and Regional Schools
features.featureContent: Form relationships with local community and technical colleges to ensure they train to your hiring needs.

socialProof.quote: “WorkAmerica alleviates the uncertainty many businesses face in filling future workforce needs”

callToAction.title: 3 Free Candidates To Get You Started.
callToAction.introduction: See for yourself how easy it is to accomplish your sourcing and hiring needs on WorkAmerica. Run your first searches free, on us.
